text.config.dfrpc-config.title: DiamondFire Rich Presence
text.config.dfrpc-config.option.CLIENT_I: The Client ID used by the mod for the rich presence.
text.config.dfrpc-config.option.IN_SPAWN: The message that displays while your in the lobby.
text.config.dfrpc-config.option.NOT_ON_D: The message that displays while not on DiamondFire (this should be removed! one day..)
text.config.dfrpc-config.option.SHOW_MOD: Should your mode (Coding, Building, Playing) show on your status?
